a.detail: Someone has scrawled "Heobo was here" here
a.summary: Someone has scrawled "Heobo was here" here

details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental fire as a mine. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has been attacked and abandoned many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

monster: Treasure: 1900 cp, 700 sp, 100 gp, 5 x diamond (50 gp), chrysoprase (50 gp), moonstone (50 gp), onyx (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp)
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "The Gray Fangs killed eight ghouls here" on the east wall, and several empty flasks are scattered throughout the room

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Ogre Zombie (cr 2, mm 316); deadly, 450 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.2: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.3: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.4: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); easy, 100 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.5: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); easy, 100 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.6: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
